description_txt: stated on October 29, 2019 in a pre-legislative media forum:
quote_txt: While previous clemency boards granted restoration of civil rights to thousands of Floridians,  "so far this year, under this clemency board, four (felons) have gotten their rights back."

description_txt: stated on November 20, 2019 in a debate:
quote_txt: "Today in America — a new study came out — 20 years out, whites who borrowed money, 94% of them have paid off their student loan debt; 5% of African Americans have paid it off."

description_txt: stated on November 20, 2019 in Democratic primary debate in Atlanta:
quote_txt: "The president had to confess in writing, in court to illegally diverting charitable contributions that were supposed to go to veterans."

description_txt: stated on November 10, 2019 in a Facebook post:
quote_txt: Says President Donald Trump "fired Lt. Col. Vindman because he testified agaisnt (sic) him and corroborated the Whistleblowers (sic) testimony."

description_txt: stated on November 20, 2019 in comments at Democratic debate:

description_txt: stated on November 20, 2019 in a tweet:

description_txt: stated on November 20, 2019 in comments during the November Democratic presidential primary debate.:
quote_txt: "160 million people like their private insurance."

description_txt: stated on November 19, 2019 in a Facebook post:

description_txt: stated on October 19, 2019 in a tweet:

description_txt: stated on November 11, 2019:
quote_txt: "There’s actually been more subpoenas issued by the (U.S. House) majority than bills passed."

description_txt: stated on March 29, 2016 in a Facebook post:
quote_txt: Says Steph Curry decided to split with Nike because the company wouldn’t allow him to write Bible scriptures in his shoes.

description_txt: stated on October 13, 2019 in an article in a local newspaper:
